items.title: Real-time Team Collaboration
items.description: Enable multiple team members to view, create, edit, and comment on tasks in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Multiple users can simultaneously edit a task and see updates within 2 seconds.
Users can add comments to tasks and all team members see them instantly.
Changes are synced across all connected devices without manual refresh.
non_functional: System should handle at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Data synchronization latency must be under 2 seconds.

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made about real-time sync and commenting features as part of collaboration.
